original_title: お父さんの異常な愛情 宮沢ゆかり
overview: A cute girl, a nervous father who is not worried about Yukari, set a curfew and managed Yukari even by making full use of peeping and voyeurism. While delighted with the growth of Yukari, the father, who was disgusted by the feelings of sadness, finally got her mind and body of Yukari with an unforgivable lie!
title: Dad's Abnormal Love, Yukari Miyazawa
